General.Name: Alumetal SA
General.Description: Alumetal S.A., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells secondary aluminium casting alloys for the automotive industry in Poland, Germany, and other European countries. It offers aluminum casting alloys in the form of one-notch ingots and waffle plates, as well as liquid metal; fluxes and salts; and by-products, including metal wastes. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Kety, Poland. As of July 3, 2023, Alumetal S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Norsk Hydro ASA.  As of June 30, 2023, Alumetal S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Norsk Hydro ASA.
